command.description: Returns the turtle's X coordinate from the center of the screen.
command.help: Parameters: none - Returns the X coordinate of the turtle.

command.description: Returns the turtle's Y coordinate from the center of the screen.
command.help: Parameters: none - Returns the Y coordinate of the turtle.

command.description: Returns the turtle's heading in degrees.
command.help: Parameters: none - Returns the current heading of the turtle in degrees.

command.description: Returns 1 if the turtle's pen is down, 0 if it is up.
command.help: Parameters: none - Checks if the turtle's pen is down.

command.description: Returns 1 if the turtle is showing, 0 if it is hiding.
command.help: Parameters: none - Checks if the turtle is visible on the screen.
